name: NINJA PLATFORMER BETA
description:
Patch Update-

0.0.1.5

Added level 4

Added Point system

Made requirement to complete that level and the level(s) before that before being able to select level in the menu

-enjoy !!!

0.0.1.4

Added third level

Say hello to Ninja Platformer. A brand new fun platformer game, this is the first game that I (MrRoyal86, the creator.) Has made, So take it easy on me please. In Ninja Platformer, you play as a ninja and make your way to the ninja tower to help stop the Red ninjas (the bad people) from taking over the tower then taking over the ninja world

What are you waiting for download and play today, IT'S FREE.

Thanks,

MrRoyal86
